sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Label from '../lib/label';
import Input from '../lib/Input';

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"label"}}>{`Label`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
